text: Pavitra ahe to (allaha), jo apalya dasala eka ratrituna adaraniya masjidipasuna, aksa masjidaparyanta ghe'una gela, jicya bhovati amhi barakati pradana karuna thevalya aheta. Yasathi ki amhi tyala apalya samarthyacya kahi mothya nisanya dakhavuna dyavyata. Nihsansaya sarvasrestha allahaca cangalya prakare aikanara, pahanara ahe
